verses.plain: Bow down thine ear, O LORD, hear me: for I am poor and needy.

tokens.t: Bow down thine ear, O
, hear me: for I
poor and needy.

verses.plain: Preserve my soul; for I am holy: O thou my God, save thy servant that trusteth in thee.

tokens.t: Preserve my soul; for I
holy: O thou my God, save thy servant that trusteth in thee.

verses.plain: Be merciful unto me, O Lord: for I cry unto thee daily.

tokens.t: Be merciful unto me, O Lord: for I cry unto thee daily.

verses.plain: Rejoice the soul of thy servant: for unto thee, O Lord, do I lift up my soul.

tokens.t: Rejoice the soul of thy servant: for unto thee, O Lord, do I lift up my soul.

verses.plain: For thou, Lord, art good, and ready to forgive; and plenteous in mercy unto all them that call upon thee.

tokens.t: For thou, Lord,
good, and ready to forgive; and plenteous in mercy unto all them that call upon thee.

verses.plain: Give ear, O LORD, unto my prayer; and attend to the voice of my supplications.

tokens.t: Give ear, O
, unto my prayer; and attend to the voice of my supplications.

verses.plain: In the day of my trouble I will call upon thee: for thou wilt answer me.

tokens.t: In the day of my trouble I will call upon thee: for thou wilt answer me.

verses.plain: Among the gods there is none like unto thee, O Lord; neither are there any works like unto thy works.

tokens.t: Among the gods
none like unto thee, O Lord; neither
like unto thy works.

verses.plain: All nations whom thou hast made shall come and worship before thee, O Lord; and shall glorify thy name.

tokens.t: All nations whom thou hast made shall come and worship before thee, O Lord; and shall glorify thy name.

verses.plain: For thou art great, and doest wondrous things: thou art God alone.

tokens.t: For thou
great, and doest wondrous things: thou
God alone.

verses.plain: Teach me thy way, O LORD; I will walk in thy truth: unite my heart to fear thy name.

tokens.t: Teach me thy way, O
; I will walk in thy truth: unite my heart to fear thy name.

verses.plain: I will praise thee, O Lord my God, with all my heart: and I will glorify thy name for evermore.

tokens.t: I will praise thee, O Lord my God, with all my heart: and I will glorify thy name for evermore.

verses.plain: For great is thy mercy toward me: and thou hast delivered my soul from the lowest hell.

tokens.t: For great
thy mercy toward me: and thou hast delivered my soul from the lowest hell.

verses.plain: O God, the proud are risen against me, and the assemblies of violent men have sought after my soul; and have not set thee before them.

tokens.t: O God, the proud are risen against me, and the assemblies of violent
have sought after my soul; and have not set thee before them.

verses.plain: But thou, O Lord, art a God full of compassion, and gracious, longsuffering, and plenteous in mercy and truth.

tokens.t: But thou, O Lord,
a God full of compassion, and gracious, longsuffering, and plenteous in mercy and truth.

verses.plain: O turn unto me, and have mercy upon me; give thy strength unto thy servant, and save the son of thine handmaid.

tokens.t: O turn unto me, and have mercy upon me; give thy strength unto thy servant, and save the son of thine handmaid.

verses.plain: Shew me a token for good; that they which hate me may see it, and be ashamed: because thou, LORD, hast holpen me, and comforted me.

tokens.t: Shew me a token for good; that they which hate me may see
, and be ashamed: because thou,
, hast holpen me, and comforted me.

footnotes.text: A Prayer…: or, A Prayer, being a Psalm of David
holy: or, one whom thou favourest
